classic.name: Diocletian's Palace
classic.description: This huge, fortress-like palace served as a residence for a Roman emperor & the military garrison.

classic.name: Golden Gate
classic.description: 4th-century Roman stone entryway to Diocletian's Palace, with arches & ornate statues.

classic.name: Forest Park Marjan
classic.description: Forested hillside park featuring jogging trails, lookout points, a botanical garden & more.

classic.name: Meštrović Gallery
classic.description: Works by 20th-century sculptor Ivan Meštrović displayed in his panoramic former residence & studio.

classic.name: Saint Domnius Cathedral
classic.description: Built in 305 CE, this cathedral dedicated to the city's patron saint has a Romanesque bell tower.
classic.address: Ul. Kraj Svetog Duje 3, 21000, Split, Croatia

classic.name: Old Town Hall
classic.description: Former town hall, dating to 1443, with Gothic windows & a loggia, now hosting temporary exhibitions.

classic.name: Klis Fortress
classic.description: Centuries-old fortress with a rich, multifaceted history, perched on a hilltop with expansive views.

foodie.name: Ćiri Biri Bela
foodie.description: Hip dorms in a genteel seasonal hostel featuring a bohemian-chic restaurant with a terrace.

foodie.name: Bokeria Kitchen & Wine
foodie.description: Stylish outpost offering international bar bites, mains & desserts, plus cocktails, coffee & wine.

foodie.name: Bakra - Steak & Pizza Bar
foodie.description: Rustic, informal eatery whipping up grilled meats, pizzas & steaks, plus wine & cocktails.

adventure.name: Split Riva
adventure.description: This bustling waterfront features an expansive boardwalk, numerous eateries & scenic views.
adventure.address: 21.000, Obala Hrvatskog narodnog preporoda 23, 21000, Split, Croatia

adventure.name: Forest Park Marjan
adventure.description: Forested hillside park featuring jogging trails, lookout points, a botanical garden & more.

adventure.name: Marjan Hill Stairs
adventure.description: Staircase with over 300 steps, climbing to an observation deck at the summit of Marjan Hill.

adventure.name: Sustipan
adventure.description: Tree-filled park on a cliff above the water, popular with picnickers & rock climbers.

cultural.name: Croatian Maritime Museum
cultural.description: Intimate 1925 museum offering a small gallery with maritime relics & art, plus a life-sized boat.

cultural.name: Froggyland
cultural.description: Quirky exhibit displaying stuffed frogs in human scenarios, like playing sports & sitting in class.

cultural.name: Archaeological Museum in Split
cultural.description: Longtime archeological museum displaying diverse artifacts in an estate-like space with a garden.
